overview: Roberta Morgan is being raised in a wealthy home where her mother is occupied with her society-club activities and her father is immersed in his business activities. She also feels that the household staff is against her and that no one understands her needs and problems. Things spiral out of control.
tagline: BELOVED - SHE'S A DARLING YOU WANT TO HUG TO YOUR HEART!
title: The Beloved Brat
